title: BAN
name: Billing Account Number
definition: Identifies the billing account to which the recurring and non- recurring charges for this request will be billed.
fieldNotes: The precise format will be defined by each provider in accordance with individual billing procedures and provided to the customer.
The BAN entry appearing on this form must be for the provider identified in the ICSC field.
validEntries: Valid Billing Account Number  E = Existing  N  = New Billing Account requested  NB = Multi-EC Non-billing provider
validEntryNotes:
If the customer wishes to have a new billing account number for this order, enter "N" in this field.  The new billing account number will appear on the bill and the Confirmation Notice Form (CN). 
"NB" represents a non-billing provider that is involved in providing this access service, when the ASC-EC field is populated. 
If an existing service BAN is invalid, the provider will determine the appropriate BAN and return it on the Confirmation Notice Form (CN). 
Use of valid entry of "E" is based on  customer/provider negotiations.
usageNotes:
Required when the ACT field is "N", "C", "D", "M" or "T", the second position of the TQ field is not "N" or "X", and the EOD USE field on the EOD Form is not "A". 
Prohibited when the second position of the TQ field is "N" or "X". 
Prohibited  w hen the EOD USE field on the EOD Form is "A". 
Otherwise optional.
